timezone.description: The timezone of the date. Must be one of the options listed in the list below.

dateFormat.description: The format of the date. Must be one of the options listed in the list below.
enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

authOptions.description: The globalActionAuth property is only available for Enterprise accounts.

get.summary: Download a signed document when the storage transport is S3

post.description: This has been deprecated in favour of "/api/v1/templates/:templateId/generate-document". You may face unpredictable behavior using this endpoint as it is no longer maintained.
post.summary: Create a new document from an existing template

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

post.description: Create a new document from an existing template. Passing in values for title and meta will override the original values defined in the template. If you do not pass in values for recipients, it will use the values defined in the template.
post.summary: Create a new document from an existing template

globalAccessAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to access the document.

globalActionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document. This field is restricted to Enterprise plan users only.

post.description:
Notes

`sendEmail` - Whether to send an email to the recipients asking them to action the document. If you disable this, you will need to manually distribute the document to the recipients using the generated signing links. Defaults to true

sendEmail.description: Whether to send an email to the recipients asking them to action the document. If you disable this, you will need to manually distribute the document to the recipients using the generated signing links.

sendCompletionEmails.description: Whether to send completion emails when the document is fully signed. This will override the document email settings.

post.summary: Create a recipient for a document

actionAuth.description: The type of authentication required for the recipient to sign the document.

authOptions.description: The authOptions property is only available for Enterprise accounts.

authOptions.description: The authOptions property is only available for Enterprise accounts.
